title: A free admonition without any fees, to warne the papistes to beware of three trees
author: Birch, William, fl. 1562-1571.
publisher: By Iohn Awdely, for Henry Kirkham, dwelling at the middle north doore of Paules, at the signe of the blacke Boy,
notes: Signed: q[uod] G.B., i.e. William Birch.
Verse - "If that you be not past all grace,".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
